title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 273/81 of 30 January 1981 adjusting the common marketing standards for certain fresh or chilled fish
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 273/81 of 30 January 1981 adjusting the common marketing standards for certain fresh or chilled fish
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Annex B to Regulation (EEC) No 103/76 is hereby amended as follows in respect of redfish and sardines:
(1) OJ No L 20, 28.1.1976, p. 1.  (2) OJ No L 359, 31.12.1980, p. 13.  (3) OJ No L 20, 28.1.1976, p. 29.  (4) OJ No L 343, 31.12.1979, p. 22.   >PIC FILE= "T0020147">

This Regulation shall enter into force on 2 February 1981.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 January 1981.
For the Commission
Georges CONTOGEORGIS
Member of the Commission
